question: Saying Aameen to a Dua over the receiver
answer:
QUESTION

I would like to confirm the permissibility of the following:

In England households have Majid receivers whereby we can listen to Adhan, Salah, Dua and bayans etc..I would like to ask whether it is possible for us ladies at home to lift our hands up for dua when the Imam is making dua in the Masjid and say Ameen.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh  

 

It is permissible to follow an Imam  in dua’ through receiver and say Aameen.

 

And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best
Wassalāmu ῾alaykum

 

Ml. Abdur Rahman Shareef,
Student Dārul Iftā

 

Under the guidance of:

Mufti Ebrahim Desai Saheb
Dārul Iftā
